```{r setup}
library(dda)
library(fda.usc)
```

```{r preprocessing}
data(aemet)
temps <- aemet$temp
str(temps)

smooth <- function(...) density(nbasis = 11, ...)

temps <- dda:::merge.dd(as.list(apply(temps$data, 1, smooth)))
plot(temps)
```

```{r ics}
plot(ICS(temps)$W)
temps_out <- ICS_outlier(temps)
plot(temps_out)
```
